typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		bus_description as string,
		bus_key as string,
		grp_key as string,
		grp_description as string,
		bua_key as string,
		bua_description as string,
		last_updated_by as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['Pre_Dim/pre_dim_business_area.parquet']) ~> preDimBusinessArea
preDimBusinessArea derive(top_key = 'ALL',
		top_description = 'All Business Areas') ~> derivedtoplevel
derivedtoplevel alterRow(upsertIf(!isNull(bus_key))) ~> alterrow
alterrow sink(input(
		PK_KEY as string,
		CPT_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CPT_NUMBER as integer,
		INSERTED_BY as string,
		DATE_INSERTED as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['dim_business_area.parquet'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dimBusinessArea
